tool_description: Extracts return transaction data from the system based on specified filters and date ranges for analysis.

start_date.description: Start date for data extraction in ISO 8601 format

end_date.description: End date for data extraction in ISO 8601 format

store_ids.description: List of store IDs to filter returns

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be earlier than end_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 timestamps
Store ID not found: One or more store IDs in the filter do not exist in the system
Date range too large: Maximum allowed date range is 2 years to prevent system overload
usage: Provide start_date and end_date to extract return data. Optionally filter by specific store_ids. The tool returns structured return records for further analysis.

total_records.description: Total number of return records extracted

extraction_summary.description: Summary of the extraction process and data coverage
